# ObservableObjectPublisher

**Class**

A publisher that publishes changes from observable objects.

## Declaration

```swift
final class ObservableObjectPublisher
```

## Creating an observable object publisher

- **init()**: Creates an observable object publisher instance.

## Delivering elements to subscribers

- **send()**: Sends the changed value to the downstream subscriber.

## Observable Objects

- **ObservableObject**: A type of object with a publisher that emits before the object has changed.

## Conforms To

- Publisher
